verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In my life Lord
Be glorified be glorified
In my life Lord
Be glorified today

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In my song Lord
Be glorified be glorified
In my song Lord
Be glorified today

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In Your church Lord
Be glorified be glorified
In Your church Lord
Be glorified today

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
In our home Lord
Be glorified be glorified
In our home Lord
Be glorified today
